summary: Exactly what it says on the title. No more bug eyes :)
descriptionHtml:
This simple tweak makes the Legendary Dragons from the Dawnguard DLC use Odahviing' model. Any texture replacers on Odahviing will affect the Legendary Dragons as well.

This is for people who dislike the Legendary Dragon's compound eyes. I for myself didn't like those eyes very much.

Should be compatible with almost any mod, as this edits the Legendary Dragon's "Outfit"(the dragons' distinct models are actually clothing game engine-wise, I found that out in while making this mod) rather than the Legendary Dragon actor itself.

Requires Dawnguard
author: XxTheSupremeOnexX
